description: Creates a custom plugin using the specified properties.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The type of the plugin file.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Information about the location of a custom plugin. The S3 bucket Amazon Resource Name (ARN), file key, and object version of the plugin file stored in Amazon S3. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an S3 bucket. The file key for an object in an S3 bucket. objectVersion (string) --- The version of an object in an S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: s3Location
nested_params.description: The S3 bucket Amazon Resource Name (ARN), file key, and object version of the plugin file stored in Amazon S3.

nested_params.name: bucketArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: fileKey
nested_params.description: The file key for an object in an S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: objectVersion
nested_params.description: The version of an object in an S3 bucket.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the custom plugin.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags you want to attach to the custom plugin. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: customPluginArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that Amazon assigned to the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: customPluginState
nested_items.description: The state of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the custom plugin.
